This game is just great. This is a must have for any PC player. Once you play this game, you will forget everything you know about COD and build your skill from the ground up. I used to play COD a lot, but after almost 4 years of playing, this game beats COD by a lot. I mean it. This has game has been the location of some of my favorite memories ever. This is a true masterpiece of a video game.
